author: jgm
content: Regarding https://github.com/eth-clients/holesky/issues/11 and client teams running validators on holesky: waiting to hear back from <@&595683609080365088> <@&688090867927482525> <@&688101493978562687> as to if they want to run validators on this network or not.  Next call is tomorrow so a response either way would be very useful; thanks.

author: mariusvanderwijden
content: I don't think geth wants to run any validators

author: parithosh
content: context: geth team usually gets access to the EF devops validators/nodes and uses that on all testnets for whatever they need

author: nishant0
content: added a comment on our end

author: yperbasis
content: Is it possible to commit to a smaller amount initially (say 5k) and then increase that to 100k a few months later? The reason is that at the moment Erigon lacks devops capacity. We've hired a devops who's starting in September, but it'll take him some time to get up to speed.

author: parithosh
content: Yeah of course, feel free to drop that in as a comment to let us plan around it
